author: IGN
description:
In the near future, a detective (Chris Pratt) stands on trial accused of murdering his wife. He has 90 minutes to prove his innocence to the advanced A.I. Judge (Rebecca Ferguson) he once championed, before it determines his fate.

The sci-fi thriller is directed by Timur Bekmambetov (Wanted) and also stars Kali Reis, Annabelle Wallis, Chris Sullivan, and Kylie Rogers.

Amazon MGM Studios will release Mercy in theaters on January 23, 2026.

#Mercy #NYCC2025 #IGN
title: Mercy: Official Trailer (2026) Chris Pratt, Rebecca Ferguson - NYCC 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Bye Sweet Carole, a narrative-driven, stylized adventure game developed by Little Sewing Machine. Players will enter an eerie yet vibrant realm as Lana Benton in search of her friend Carole. Overcome platforming challenges, solve puzzles, and transform into a rabbit to evade deadly threats. Bye Sweet Carole is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Bye Sweet Carole - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
It's a magic showdown. Check out this Now You See Me: Now You Don’t clip from the upcoming film starring Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Dave Franco, Isla Fisher, Justice Smith, Dominic Sessa, Ariana Greenblatt, with Rosamund Pike, and Morgan Freeman.

The Four Horsemen return along with a new generation of illusionists performing mind-melding twists, turns, surprises, and magic unlike anything ever captured on film.

Now You See Me: Now You Don't, directed by Ruben Fleischer (Venom, Uncharted, Zombieland), opens in theaters on November 14, 2025.
title: Now You See Me: Now You Don’t - Official 'Magic Showdown' Clip (2025) Jesse Eisenberg

author: IGN
description:
Cecil joins the fray. Watch the latest Invincible VS trailer for this upcoming 3v3 tag fighting game to see the announcement that intelligence agent Cecil Stedman is joining the roster as a playable fighter. The new Invincible VS trailer shows Cecil in action. Cecil joins a growing lineup of superheroes in Invincible VS, including Mark Grayson (Invincible), Atom Eve, Bulletproof, Thula, Rex Splode, Battle Beast and Omni-Man. Invincible VS will be available in 2026 on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC. Registration for an upcoming Invincible VS Closed Alpha in 2025 is available now.

Most often heard as a voice in Mark’s earpiece, Cecil enters the fight in Invincible VS with specialized weapons, including plasma pistols, projectile launchers and grenades to keep opponents at a distance. His ranged gameplay style is paired with tactical combat, allowing him to play cat and mouse with enemies. Want more? Cecil can also summon a limitless supply of Reanimen for backup; with access to
title: Invincible VS - Official Cecil Reveal Trailer | NYCC 2025

author: IGN
description: Blast through demons in this brutal new Painkiller gameplay trailer for the upcoming reimagined high-octane action shooter game. In Painkiller, battle across gruesome gothic environments to stop the fallen angel Azazel’s invasion of Earth and earn your salvation – solo with bots or in online co-op for up to three players. Painkiller will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam on October 21, 2025.
title: Painkiller - Official Blood Pact Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join writer/director Bryan Bertino and stars Dakota Fanning and Kathryn Hunter for a behind-the-scenes look at the upcoming movie, Vicious. Vicious also stars Mary McCormack, Rachel Blanchard, Devyn Nekoda, Klea Scott, and Emily Mitchell. Vicious is streaming on Paramount+ and available to buy on digital October 10, 2025.

When Polly (Dakota Fanning) receives a mysterious Box from an unexpected late-night visitor, it comes with a simple instruction: place three things inside:  something you need, something you hate, and something you love. What begins as a strange ritual quickly unravels into a waking nightmare. Trapped in a terrifying world where reality bends and memory betrays, Polly must navigate a series of impossible choices. As time slips away, she’s forced to confront the darkness not just around her, but within her—before it consumes everything  and everyone she’s ever known.

Vicious is produced by Richard Suckle, p.g.a. and Bryan Bertino. Melinda Whitaker and Shane Boucher
title: Vicious - Official 'A Vicious Look' Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Dakota Fanning, Kathryn Hunter

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Haunted Masquerade' Season 19 Trailer for Overwatch 2, the hit first-person action battle royale game developed by Activision Blizzard. Players will partake in the spooky festivities with the Haunted Masquerade by wearing masks to enable new ability combos in-game. More game updates to Stadium are also packed with the 'Haunted Masquerade' Season 19 for Overwatch 2, launching on October 14.

#IGN #Gaming #overwatch2
title: Overwatch 2: Season 19 - Official 'Haunted Masquerade' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
They’re still figuring this whole “saving the realm” thing out. Check out The Mighty Nein trailer for this upcoming new animated series from Critical Role and Titmouse. The series stars Critical Role founders and cast members Laura Bailey (The Last of Us: Part II), Taliesin Jaffe (World of Warcraft), Ashley Johnson (The Last of Us), Liam O’Brien (Marvel’s Avengers), Matthew Mercer (Baldur’s Gate 3), Marisha Ray (Fallout 76), Sam Riegel (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles), and Travis Willingham (Marvel's Avengers). Additional guest cast for The Mighty Nein includes Anjelica Huston, Lucy Liu, Nathan Fillion, T’Nia Miller, Felicia Day, Graham McTavish, and Ivanna Sakhno.

The Mighty Nein follows a group of fugitives and outcasts, bound by secrets and scars. But when a powerful arcane relic known as "The Beacon" falls into dangerous hands, they must learn to work together to save the realm and stop reality itself from unraveling.

The Critical Role cast serves as executive producers alongside
title: The Mighty Nein - Official Trailer | NYCC 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at gameplay and the fantasy world of Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era in this latest trailer for the upcoming turn-based strategy game. In Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era, explore the map solo or in multiplayer, triumph in iconic battles and establish peace on a continent where it was never an option. Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era will be available on PC via Steam. A demo is out now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Absolum reviewed by Will Borger on PC, also available on PlayStation and Nintendo Switch.

Absolum is an excellent beat ‘em up let down by a roguelite structure that doesn’t suit it. I hate being limited by numbers instead of skill in action games, and in the early hours here, it feels like you’re a slave to them. Once you get to the point where each run has you making substantial progress and the story picks up, Absolum is very compelling. But it took me a long time to get there. Gorgeous artwork, an excellent soundtrack, and smart combat spread out among several distinct characters do a lot to carry it, but they can’t fix the feeling of dread when I died, again, and realized that I would have to do some variation of the same exact thing once more. I’m not against failure; I just wish there was more variety to it, and Absolum doesn’t find that until a good way into its runtime. That it manages to emerge as a compelling beat ‘em up in spite of that is a testament to the skill and work
title: Absolum Review

author: IGN
description:
Crimson Desert's combat system combines fighting game influences with swords, magic, and battle robots. 

How does that strange mix come together? We spoke to developer Pearl Abyss to find out.

#IGN #CrimsonDesert #ActionAdventure
title: Swords, Magic, and Battle Robots: Crimson Desert's Combat Explained - IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Watch our Battlefield 6 review! At nine missions and just five hours, Battlefield 6’s campaign’s flame doesn’t burn for long, and it doesn’t burn particularly bright in that time, either. It’s a staggering spectacle to behold at times, and a treat for the ears at others, but when it comes to mission design and an engaging plot, it fails to deliver at all. 

A quick afternoon of fun, it's a safe reimagining of what Battlefield once was, but far from a bold reinvention of what it could, and maybe should, be now.

Battlefield 6 single-player campaign reviewed on PS5 Pro by Simon Cardy.

#IGN #Battlefield6 #Review
title: Battlefield 6 Campaign Review

author: IGN
description:
Jada and Nick sat down and chatted with Absolum's Lead Designer & Co-Creative Lead Jordi Asensio all about how the games roguelite gameplay is highly addicting, his teams philosophy behind the games design, its outstanding art direction, and how they implimented a "dont fix the fun" ethos with Absolum's gameplay. 

You can check out Absolum now on PlayStation, Switch, and Steam. 

This Podcast Beyond Clip is hosted by Jada Griffin and Nick Maillet
title: How Absolum Mixes Beat-Em-Up and Roguelite Gameplay Loops To Get You Hooked - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the MachineGames Anniversary Update Trailer for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, the hit first-person action-adventure game based on the iconic movie franchise developed by MachineGames. 

MachineGames celebrates 15 years with new additions to their latest outing, bringing New Game+, the iconic Cairo outfit, and voice language selection to Indiana Jones and the Great Circle via an upcoming update to the game. The MachineGames Anniversary Update for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is launching on October 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam), with a release coming to Nintendo Switch 2 at a later date.

#IGN #IndianaJones #AnniversaryUpdate
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - Official MachineGames Anniversary Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at this in-depth discussion with AMD’s Jack Huynh, SVP and GM, Computing and Graphics Group, and Mark Cerny, lead architect of PS5 and PS5 Pro, discussing the current developments of their technical partnership with Project Amethyst. 

Both legendary figures in the interactive technology space lay out the elements of the future of graphics processing, from Machine Learning-based technology being used to facilitate improvements in a future console to be seen in a few years time by Sony.

#IGN #PlayStation #AMD
title: Sony x AMD - Official 'Future of Play' Overview Video

author: IGN
description:
The heroes in a half shell are ready to take fans on their next big adventure, IGN can exclusively reveal the official trailer for Season 2 of Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (TMNT) – the hit animated series continuing the story of TMNT: Mutant Mayhem – and it’s just the beginning of an all-new era for the franchise.
 
The trailer gives fans a first look at what’s next for Leonardo, Raphael, Michelangelo, and Donatello as they face fresh threats and new allies in a city that’s more alive – and mutating – than ever. Tales of the TMNT returns this December, exclusively on Paramount+.

#IGN #TMNT
title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Season 2 - Exclusive Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Minecraft Pack Launch Trailer for Sonic Racing: Crossworlds, an arcade racing game developed by SEGA. 

Players will enter the world of Minecraft with Steve, Alex, or Creeper with the latest DLC pack. Get first place in the Minecraft Cart to the legendary and serene music of the Overworld with the Minecraft Pack, available now for Sonic Racing: Crossworlds on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #SonicRacingCrossWorlds #KartRacing
title: Sonic Racing: Crossworlds - Official Minecraft Pack Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Fortnitemares 2025 has arrived. Watch the latest Fortnite trailer to see what to expect with the Fortnitemares 2025 event, which features familiar faces and horror icons like Ghostface, the Scooby Doo gang, Art the Clown, The Grabber (from the Black Phone movie franchise), Jason Voorhees, Wednesday Addams, and Doja Cat. 

The Fornitemares 2025 event in Fortnite is available today (October 9) until October 31, 2025.

#IGN #Fortnite #Fortnitemares
title: Fortnite - Official Fortnitemares 2025 Gameplay Trailer

description: Get your first look at the story in Code Vein 2, the upcoming stylish soulslike sequel from Bandai Namco. It's due out on PC and consoles on January 30, 2026.
title: Code Vein 2 - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Gameplay Trailer for Copa City, the upcoming football (soccer) organization management game developed by Triple Espresso. Players will manage all of the logistics before the players hit the pitch, from stadium structures, security, fan placement, and more, to ensure maximum readiness for the big game. Copa City is launching on March 26, 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Copa City - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Street Fighter 6 gains a new costume for the red cyclone himself: Zangief! 

Sporting some new mechanical upgrades and a new song from metal band Cavalera Conspiracy, fittingly titled: Piledriver. 

Get ready for a true body of iron when Zangief's Outfit 4 arrives with the C. Viper Update on October 15.

#IGN #StreetFighter6 #FightingGames
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official Zangief Outfit 4 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Little Nightmares 3 reviewed by Tristan Ogilvie on PlayStation 5. Also available on PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC, and Nintendo Switch/Switch 2.

Despite a pair of new protagonists and the inclusion of two-player support for the first time in the series, Little Nightmares 3 doesn’t do enough to distinguish itself from the previous two adventures, making each step through its shadowy structures less full of dread and more like a retread. There are some memorably morbid moments here and there, and the Carnavale chapter is a standout, but the constant crate-pushing and instant-fail chase sequences feel all too familiar at this point. Little Nightmares 3 features little innovation, few scares, and limited appeal if you’ve already played the previous two games, unless you’re dead keen to experience the series’ signature brand of stop-start stealth with a friend in tow.
title: Little Nightmares 3 Review
